chat_logs.text: Hello! I'm looking forward to making a deal. Let's find something that works for us both.
Hello there.  I am absolutely interested in coming to an agreement as well.  it's pleasant to meet you!
Nice to meet you too. So what do you need most?

That's awesome! I am most definitely NOT a chef, but I'm going to be doing a lot of hiking, so I'll need a lot of water to stay hydrated. And a bit of extra food to keep us all full.

Fair enough.  I'm also going to need a bit of water, but I'm sure we can come to an agreement fair for both of us.  As far as food goes, I only require very little, my pantry already is pretty stocked there.
Well, if I take 2 waters and you take 1, will you let me have all of the food?
I think that's asking a bit too much, because I still would like some food.  I'd be willing to take all the firewood, one water, and one food, if that sounds passable to you.
Well, if I'm splitting the food and water with you, I'd like a single firewood. I'm no chef, but it'll be freezing cold overnight, and I just need a little extra to keep warm.

I must insist on the Firewood, that's the most important thing to me - you should have enough from your default package for a nice fire.  I could use more water, but I'm letting you take the lions share of that, so I think one food isn't too unfair for that.
Okay, that's fair. You put in the deal, and I'll gladly accept.
Alrighty.  Hope you have fun on your hiking!  Make sure you stay hydrated.  Going to push it through now.
Sounds good, you have fun, too! And good luck cooking up all that food, chef!
Submit-Deal
Accept-Deal

chat_logs.text: Hi! How are you doing today?

Hello, how are you today? hoping today is finding you well. I am going camping with my youth camp, 40 kids! lots of work on my end. I was wondering If its okay with you, if I can get all 3 waters? I am willing to give you all 3 of my Firewood? i really need the extra supplies for cooking, cleaning, and to compensate for the amount of water kids will be spilling. what are your thoughts?

Wow, 40 kids.  Thats lot.  I decided to bring my family with me today including my grandmother, grandfather and young children.  I was hoping to at least get one water to make my baby some formula.  So I propose I take 1 water, 2 food and all firewood?

its our annual youth camp, lots of fun but with a lot of work. Oh no! I completely understand your worries, as I will be having kids as young as 2 at the camp. I am willing to part with 2 foods and all firewood for all 3 waters. Not wanting to disregard your family, but my numbers truly need the extra supplies of water. specially with the amount of cooking I will be doing. We are camping for 15 days. May I ask how long you are camping for?

I completely understand, children are very important.  They are our future.  We are camping for 14 days.  I wanted to give my children/family the experience of living outdoors with out the technology and other distractions we typically have at home.  I am willing to agree to 2 foods, 3 firewood.  I believe it is fair for both of us

I completely agree with you, different ages as well, required different needs. One thing I have learned camping, the more supplies you'll have the better off, you will be. just to confirm, I will be getting 3 waters, 1 food, and 0 FW.
Yes, I will be taking 2 foods and 3 Firewoods.  I hope you have amazing camping trip
wishing you the same! where are you guys camping to? we are going to colorado! 🙂
We are going in Georgia! We are excited for our little family time.

Never been to Georgia, but I've heard its completely gorgeous down there, your family will truly have a treat. plus you wont have the worry of taking care of so many kids, kids that arent yours lol! so thankful for my volunteers who are coming with me.
Submit-Deal
Accept-Deal

value2reason.High: I believe my young children with me and want to make sure I have enough water for her formula
value2reason.Medium: My entire family is here including my grandma and grandpa.
value2reason.Low: Since it is alot of us, it will take a little more to keep us warm

value2reason.High: camping brings alot of uncertainties, plus when you are camping with alot of children. kids needs differ from adults, they drink and spill alot more water than adults. plus with the cooking and cleaning afterwards, having the extra water would be nice.
value2reason.Medium: having extra food would be best, as kids tend to either overeat or under eat no in between, would be best to have extra just to ensure we have the supply on hand.
value2reason.Low: we are camping i can gather wood and brush from surrounding areas.
